example.text: For too long, large oil and gas companies have made record profits while price-gouging American drivers at the pump. [[user]]’ budget will put an end to their tax giveaways while saving taxpayers $30 billion.

Some of my fondest memories with Matt are from our bipartisan 2019 codel to South Korea and Vietnam, organized by Senator Leahy. I will never forget standing at the DMZ with Matt and taking pictures with North Korean soldiers while they were taking pictures of us.
Thanks to the Bipartisan Safer Communities Act, we’re training more professionals in our communities to recognize and help treat mental health issues!
